'''"Kururuk"''' is an open-world [[Qucusaurus]] [[NPC]] located in {{Location|Quahuacan Cliff}} and appeared in {{Quest|Sauro-Vet's Dilemma}}. After completion of the World Quest and a post-quest cut scene, she can be found with [[Mazkal]] just outside of [["Flower-Feather Clan"]] at the same pile of boxes at the start of the World Quest near Mazkal's camp.
